## R Markdown

```{r error=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(scales)
```

```{r error=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
title_basics <- read_tsv(
  "title.basics.tsv",
  na = "\\N",
  quote = ""
)

title_episode <- read_tsv(
  "title.episode.tsv",
  na = "\\N",
  quote = ""
)

title_ratings <- read_tsv(
  "title.ratings.tsv",
  na = "\\N",
  quote = ""
)
```

```{r error=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
tv_series <- title_basics %>%
  filter(!is.na(endYear))

tv_series_ids <- tv_series$tconst
```

```{r error=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
tv_series_ratings <- title_ratings %>%
  filter(tconst %in% tv_series_ids)

tv_series_episodes <- title_episode %>%
  filter(parentTconst %in% tv_series_ids)
```
